definition: thousands of purples and reds (idiom); a blaze of color/fig. a profusion of flourishing trades

sentences.english: Let's create the warm resplendence together, and greet the polychrome spring.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們共同創造溫暖的輝煌，迎接萬紫千紅的春天。

sentences.english: Alwayss colorful spring blossom with previous years.
sentences.chinese: 萬紫千紅總是春，花開花落昔年同。

sentences.english: With thousands of flowers in bloom and the sun shining brightly, spring is here.
sentences.chinese: 萬紫千紅，陽光明媚的春天已經來了。

sentences.english: Full Ying Guo, Woods Hongye dance autumn wind.
sentences.chinese: 萬紫千紅迎國慶，片片紅葉舞秋風。

sentences.english: It is spring only when all the flowers are blooming.
Overlooking the mountains and rivers plain green, and colorful people smile.
sentences.chinese: 俯視山河平原綠，萬紫千紅人笑顏。

sentences.english: Full Ying Guo， Woods Hongye dance autumn wind.
sentences.chinese: 萬紫千紅迎國慶，片片紅葉舞秋風。

sentences.english: Flowers of all sorts are blooming in a riot of colour.

definition: tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
lit. birdsong and fragrant flowers (idiom); fig. the intoxication of a beautiful spring day
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
